summary: Franssou, a charming Parisian English teacher, who shares part of her life with a boring middle-aged lover, dreams of another life. So, when she unexpectedly inherits 50,000 euros, she ... See full summary »
cast: José Garcia|Renée Le Calm|Isabelle Carré|Raymond Gil|Richard Morgiève|Éliane Adatto|Guilaine Londez|Mar Sodupe|Michel Vuillermoz|Charline Paul|Gérard Jumel|Colette Grivet|Jean-Claude Bolle-Reddat|Sébastien Féron|Claire Charré|Jean-Paul Bonnaire|François Cluzet|Aurélie Valat|Vincent Andrieu|Joseph Braconnier|Philippe Smail|Stéphane Jouin|Patrick Palmero|Olivier Dazat|Marius Colucci|Luang Ham Chau|Hoan Pham|Philippe Manesse|Jean-Louis Combelles|Habibur Rahman|Marion Waternaux|Fernand Dalmasso|Luis Rego|Michel Ouimet|Kim Nhan|Claude Testoris|Marcelle Barreau|Guillaume Bacquet|Georges Eon|Johnny Luchenne|Béatrice Khebizi
title: Quatre étoiles
